member_organisations: Number of natural persons is not applicable, due to our legal status as a fundation - defined by the foundation capital plus the public surveillance by the state.
eu_initiatives:
participating in EU research programm SUSTAIN with our affiliate Stiftung Gesundheit Fördergemeinschaft. 
 
Providing Data and Analysis on public health in Germany to national and international research Institutes and most of the statutory and many private health insurance companies. 
 
providing Analysis on Health care in the field such as national, regional and local heat maps of least supply zones for specific medical indications and / or special requierements of handicapped.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

print newsletter quarterly to a wide range fo stakeholders, politicians, leaders in (medical) associations and research in public health

goals__remit:
fostering transparency in Healthcare for patients and professionals.  
 
providing e.g. the register of all physicians with detailed data on medical specialisations and education, languages provided and details on previsions for all kind of handicaps of patients of all health care providers 
 
evidence based system of analysis of quality on health care related informations, in print, digital and app.
